definitions: formed or arranged into strata or layers

examples.text: warming temperatures can lead to more stratified ocean layers

definitions: (of a society) divided into levels or classes based on social status, education, or income

examples.text: a stratified society in which political power and influence still lay in the hands of the landed class

shortDefinitions: (of society) divided into levels based on social status

definitions: (of seeds) placed close together in layers in moist sand or peat to preserve them or to help them germinate

examples.text: it grows best in well drained soil from stratified seeds

shortDefinitions: (of seeds) placed close together in layers
